text: @due_latte @newportbeachgov @MayorONeill Infection rate is at 6 percent vs 4 percent 2 weeks ago. Each person spreads it to 400 people within 30 days. Just 10 infected people in the bathroom or in the line for ice cream at the pier can infect 4,000 people in the next 30 days!! That fact makes it not acceptable.
